Question: Rohde & Schwarz USA, Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Rohde & Schwarz USA, Inc.

Product: CES 2024 Automotive Test Solutions

- Showcasing radar test solution for simulating objects at extremely short distances
- Highlighting wireless Battery Management System (BMS) validation and production test solution
- Demonstrating FMCW radar minimum object distance for radar object simulation
- Exhibiting R&S AREG800A automotive radar echo generator and R&S QAT100 antenna array for testing radar-based advanced driver assistance systems
- Presenting R&S CMX500 5G one-box signaling tester for 5G Voice Quality and LTE-based emergency call testing
- Executives available for individual meetings
- Exhibiting at CES 2024 in Las Vegas from January 9 to 12, 2024, booth #6567
Summary_cn:
罗德与施瓦茨美国有限公司。

产品：CES 2024汽车测试解决方案

- 展示用于模拟极短距离物体的雷达测试解决方案
- 强调无线电池管理系统（BMS）验证和生产测试解决方案
- 展示FMCW雷达用于雷达物体模拟的最小物体距离
- 展示R&S AREG800A汽车雷达回波发生器和R&S QAT100天线阵列，用于测试基于雷达的高级驾驶员辅助系统
- 展示R&S CMX500 5G一体化信令测试仪，用于5G语音质量和基于LTE的紧急呼叫测试
- 公司高管可进行个别会议
- 在2024年1月9日至12日于拉斯维加斯举办的CES 2024展览会上展出，展位号6567
